name: Matrix Jump
description:
Jump through the matrix!

  • Movement: WASD
  • Look: Mouse
  • Jump: Space
  • Super jump: Jump into the bottom of a tile
  • Custom maps: go to maps/custom/custom.matrixmap and edit it

.matrixmap editing:https://matrixmapcode.blogspot.com/2021/11/matrixcode.html

Make sure to hit escape after hitting play or custom, to get the mouse pointer in the window
